trans-unit.source: Specifies metadata for a type, property, field, or method marked with the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.ExportAttribute"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指定中繼資料型別、 屬性、 欄位或方法標記為<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.ExportAttribute"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.ExportMetadataAttribute"></xref> with the specified name and metadata value.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.ExportMetadataAttribute"></xref>具有指定名稱和中繼資料值。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the name of the metadata value, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ExportMetadataAttribute.Name*> property to an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含中繼資料值的名稱或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ExportMetadataAttribute.Name*>屬性設為空字串 ("")。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ExportMetadataAttribute.Name*>

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the metadata value.
trans-unit.target: 包含中繼資料值的物件。

trans-unit.source: This can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 這可以是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether this item is marked with this attribute more than once.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否此項目會標示了這個屬性一次以上。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the item is marked more than once; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果超過一次; 標示為項目否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the metadata value.
trans-unit.target: 取得中繼資料值的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the name of the metadata value.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含中繼資料值的名稱。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the metadata value.
trans-unit.target: 包含中繼資料值的物件。
